subsection.name: Requirements
subsection.p: This module requires version 2.1.2 or higher of the Lutece kernel (lutece-core)
The plugin MyLutece should be installed in version 2.1.0 or higher

subsection.name: Build and deploy
subsection.p: To build the latest version just follow this steps
(NB: Subversion's client and Maven2 should be installed on your system)

div.pre: $ svn export http://dev.lutece.paris.fr/svn/lutece/portal/trunk/plugins/module-mylutece-openid module-mylutece-openid $ cd module-mylutece-openid $ mvn lutece:assembly

subsection.p: The last command will build the module's package as an archive named module-mylutece-openid-xxx-bin-xxxx.zip in the directory ./target/assembly
To deploy this package, just extract its content in your webapp's root.

subsection.name: Configuration
subsection.p: As soon as the module has been extracted in the webapp, just activate it in the "Plugins management" feature of the Lutece backoffice
